Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GENAI allows me to receive instant answers about content I am stuck on, and if I require further clarification, I then ask the teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Gen AI is able to give more in-depth feedback than a teacher as it basically has unlimited time when compared to a teacher and you can constantly ask it questions without annoying it.
